affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
notes:
Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).
Only instances of 5 or more damage will trigger Refraction.
cmb:
100
17
lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
name: templar_assassin_refraction

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 10 seconds.
notes:
Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position.
Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.
attrib:
BONUS DAMAGE: 50/100/150/200
ARMOR REDUCTION: 2/4/6/8
ARMOR REDUCTION DURATION: 10
cmb:
50/50/50/50
6
lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
name: templar_assassin_meld

desc: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.
notes:
Split damage hits invisible units.
Attack effects like Unique Attack Modifiers and Bash will only be applied to the main target.
Attacks against illusions will not split.
lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
name: templar_assassin_psi_blades

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.
cmb: 0.50
name: templar_assassin_trap

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow an additional 5% every second, up to 50%.
notes:
Traps last indefinitely.
They have invisibility that fades in over 2 seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.
Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.
attrib:
MAX TRAPS: 5/8/11
MIN MOVEMENT SLOW: 30%
MAX MOVEMENT SLOW: 50%
SLOW DURATION: 5
cmb:
15/15/15
11/8/5
lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
name: templar_assassin_psionic_trap
